    • Method Detail

      • getRawPosition

        public PointXYZ getRawPosition()
        Description copied from interface: Odometry
        Get the raw position reported by the odometry system.

        I'd also like to suggest that you make use of the method PointXYZ.zeroIfNull(PointXYZ). Doing so will ensure your odometry never reports a null position. I personally have had some issues with exactly that, so I'm putting this warning here so I can possibly save someone a bit of a headache.

        Returns:
        the raw position reported by the odometry system.
